ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that only the "Binding Object" or the "Binding Object Alternate" field is specified and not both.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISBLANK( BindingObject__c ) ) && NOT( ISBLANK( BindingObjectAlternate__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only specify the "Binding Object" field or the "Binding Object Alternate" field; not both.
